      • begin

        public void begin()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.rmi.NotBoundException
        This methods start the command line interface, asking if connecting with SOCKET or RMI calling the respective functions.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.rmi.NotBoundException

      • startRmi

        private void startRmi()
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Start rmi methods ask for the ip of the server to which connect and try to locate the remote registry with the rmi controller. Also initialize the client controller and the listener of the model. The registry is bounded at port 1200.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if server is not reachable or cannot locate the registry.
        java.rmi.NotBoundException

      • startSocket

        private void startSocket()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Start socket method create a new Socket connection between the client and the server. Initialize the socket and input / output streams for comunication as well as the client controller, the listener of the model and the responses decoder.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • chooseGame

        public void chooseGame()
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        First phase to start a game. The user is asked to choose if he wants to start a new game or join an existing one. In the first case, he also has to choose the map to play with and the end mode (between sudden death and final frenzy). Next the choose username phase is running and finally the playing phase.
        Specified by:
        chooseGame in interface ViewClient
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • chooseUsername

        private void chooseUsername(int givenId)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to ask the user the game id to connect / to retrieve information about the map selected or chosen, and to select a name and a color of the player. Success only if the name and the color are not already in use.
        Parameters:
        givenId - if -1 is a request to join a game, so the game id to which join is asked. Otherwise this represent the id of the map selected for the new game.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • playing

        public void playing()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Playing loop in whic a commad is asked and executed. If the command is not valid (validated server side) a message is shown. Loop ends if a closing response is send by server or if the client as lost connection. In this last case the client is permitted to connect again, otherwise he will be closed.
        Specified by:
        playing in interface ViewClient
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • nextCommand

        private java.lang.String nextCommand()
        Method to get the next command from the user. If the game is not started, a message is shown. If he has to be closed or he has lost connection or he has been set as inactive, the command is not executed. If he is inactive he will send a request of wake.
        Returns:
        the string representing the command

      • loopIntegerAsk

        private int loopIntegerAsk(java.lang.String question,
                           int max)
        Method to ask user a question for which e can respond only with an integer going from 0 to max.
        Parameters:
        question - the message shown to user
        max - the max value of the valid range of the answer
        Returns:
        the integer representing the answer

      • loopStringAsk

        private java.lang.String loopStringAsk(java.lang.String question,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> values)
        Method to ask user a question for which e can respond only with an already established string
        Parameters:
        question - the message shown to user
        values - the possible answers
        Returns:
        the string representing the answer
